snippet.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - INTO HEL | Dev Diary | Episode 2
snippet.description:
Check out Into Hel: Dev Diary Episode #2! 

Join our Publishing Director, Matej, as he dives into Jotunnslayer fans' burning questions! What’s in store for character playstyles? When can you expect more variety? And what updates are coming to meta progression and difficulty options?

Find out all the details—and don’t forget to share your thoughts and questions on Discord! 

Questions

00:00 Intro
00:29 Can we expect a significant difference in character playstyles at Early Access launch? 
01:09 Will the repetitiveness be addressed at Early Access launch?
01:58 Can we expect more variety in skills, heroes, bosses, and enemies?
02:30 Will there be updates to meta progression, the skill tree, and UI in the Early Access launch?
02:56 Maximum level and XP bonuses feel useless at the moment. 
03:20 Will the achievements be in the game? 
03:36 Will there be more lore and text to enrich the game? 
04:09 Do you plan to add more challenging difficulty options? 
04:43 Will multiplayer or couch co-op make it to Early Access?
04:57 Will we see more meta progression bonuses to match the rising difficulty?
05:16 Outro 


Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel DEMO is available on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/30... 

Join the Jotunnslayer community on Discord: 
https://discord.com/invite/Zst6agwu8v
